title: Online Nursing Management Re-Education: Interaction-Based Scenario Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing management knowledge and practical experience
context.additional_context: Digital device provision, formative assessment-centered operation.

learning_goals: Application of nine nursing management theories to real-world scenarios to enhance problem-solving skills in clinical tasks
Acquisition of nursing team leadership and decision-making skills through four case studies
Strengthening self-directed learning competencies by sharing experiences through peer interactions
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
